meanings.definition: Being the only one of its kind
meanings.sent1: The snowflake was uniquer than any other in the bunch.
meanings.sent2: Her painting style is uniquer than most artists in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: His uniquer fashion sense always turns heads at the party.
meanings.sent4: The unicorn's horn was as uniquer as a diamond in the rough.
meanings.sent5: The antique vase's design was truly uniquer than anything I had ever seen.

meanings.definition: Characterized by being different from anything else
meanings.sent1: The new species of bird was uniquer than any other in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Her uniquer approach to problem-solving impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The cat's uniquer behavior always made the family laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in a uniquer palette of colors.
meanings.sent5: The uniquer taste of the exotic fruit left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.definition: Having no like or equal; unparalleled
meanings.sent1: The singer's voice was uniquer than any other in the competition.
meanings.sent2: The mountain range offered a uniquer view than the valley below.
meanings.sent3: The dog's uniquer tricks amazed everyone at the park.
meanings.sent4: The starry night sky was as uniquer as a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The uniquer beauty of the rare flower captivated all who saw it.
